text: Futhi phakathi kwabo kunalabo abahlupha uMphrofethi futhi bathi “yena uyindlebe” (ulalela zonke izindaba) ithi uyindlebe (ungumlaleli wezindaba) ezinhle zenu ukholwa kuMvelinqangi futhi ukholwa ngabakholwayo nomusa kulabo abakholwayo phakathi kwenu futhi labo abahlupha isithunywa sikaMvelinqangi okwabo isijeziso esibuhlungu
